CustomField.inlineHelpText: "Pre-approved" For AM: pricing and T&Cs follow a blanket approval. For PrM: pricing/margin and T&Cs authorized by the BG. "G4 approved or contracted": pricing and T&Cs are exactly the one of the signed contract Or Inline with previous approved G4.
